response.message: Congratulations, Susan! Enjoy the Godlike powers!
Congrats, Hedge! Keep happily answering those questions!
Super duper congrats on your new role! :-D And wow, how the community team has grown this year!
Congratulations HedgeMage - good to put a face to an online persona:-)
With great power comes gr... oh, you already know.  Congratulations!
Susan, you look great on that photo in this blog and i feel that such a beautiful person should not be shy for a photograph.

@ashwin: Some beautiful people are very introverted and camera-shy. For example, not to blow my own trumpet, both my wife and I fall into that category (we're both INFPs). :-)

I won't suppose to speak for Susan. She may well be that way, or it could be something else. Whatever the reason is, it's likely to stay a mystery. :-)
First time i've seen a Parenting SE Badge--lotta bling. at first i thought you were from the NASCAR Stack Exchange
